name: iQ-chem
tagline: Q-Chem scripts, iPython notebooks, and other utilities
body:
iQ-Chem
=======

Q-Chem scripts, iPython notebooks, and other utilities

Dependencies:  iPython, matplotlib, pylab (numpy, scipy, etc.)

Current lay-out:

[[useful scripts]]:
This folder is for personal scripts that have been shared for everyone's use.  This should contain moderate documentation (functionality, usage, and an example).

notebook:
This contains an example notebook to demonstrate some neat tricks one can do with an iPython notebook.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
